title: Help, League keep minimizing itself
body:
Hi,

So I got a problem, Sometimes when I am still in-game, league suddenly minimize itself while nothing happened on my desktop. There were no notification or any other program running. I already tried to reinstall league, performed clean boot, and even used HRT apps, but the problem still exist. Important note: only happened in-game and its also only happen in League of Legends (my other games works fine).

replies.body:
Bump.  I too have encountered this problem except when it does this and pull the game window back up it resets my display scaling on high DPI settings which I have disabled because otherwise the cursor in-game is freaking tiny and affects my ability to play effectively.  It's only been occurring about the last 2 or 3 days. Never had it before.   It happens every single game, regardless of map or mode.  Interestingly enough, at least for me, this issue pops up around the 7-8 minute mark of the game.  If I reconnect to the game when this happens everything will work fine for the rest of the game.  For what ever reason during every game now at about the 7-8 minute mark my League minimizes itself out of the blue.

I have also tried the same as the original poster.  I am currently doing the full repair through the client options.  I'll post back here if that resolves the problem or if it persists.  This isn't necessarily 'game breaking' because when it happens I just close the game window, go back to the client window, hit reconnect, and I'm back in the game with everything normal all in about 30 secs. However, 30 seconds is still enough that my absence could mean my opponent gets a 20 cs lead or the enemy team gets a tower for free because I wasn't there.
Update:  Full Repair did NOT resolve the problem and it keeps happening.

This is widely reported to be caused by the latest Windows updates. It affects all full screen apps.

Curiously, I noticed that when not in a full screen game, periodically a windows would appear and vanish almost faster than I could blink. I wondered if this window loading and then vanishing was responsible. 
Having ruled out malware, I started to log what times it was happening. For me it was always at the same time, once per hour whatever I was playing. I checked the windows "Task Scheduler" and found that a task called "OfficeBackgroundTaskHandlerRegistration" was supposedly launching at the same time this window was, and all my minimized games was happening.

I disabled it. So far no minimized games.
I have the same bug. but for me, it happens at least once a game. Sometime it happens two times. Only in loading screen. I did a full repair and it still happen. Even in Practice tool mode.

Hey, I just started having this problem a few days ago after I installed diablo 2 and I never had the problem before. I'm thinking it might be direct x program that's causing game to minimize but not 100% sure yet

It sounds like your pc is switching the focus of your windows to something different, possibly from a pop-up notification from something running in the background. There's also always a chance that you might be hitting your windows key on accident which will pull up the start menu. If that's still happening and you know you aren't hitting anything to make it switch windows, I would try running a quick repair through the client options to see if that fixes it.
It still happen, one thing to note probably is that this problem start exist recently, like 3 months. Last year, there was no such problem.

Weeeeiiiiiird. Lets go ahead and get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can do a lot more digging than I can here on the boards, so you'll be in good hands with them ^_^!
I am having the same issue, only since the last patch. 3 other people I play with regularly also have the same issue. I think you introduced a bug in the last patch
This is also happening to me.  I'll have to check timing.  This only started after the last patch for me.
If you're running windows 10, it's likely a bug with Office trying to update itself and failing. Check your task scheduler :)
Hey Riot, you obviously have introduced a bug to the game at the last patch, any chance you can do something about it?
